item.title: Drug use and deliveries, 3rd January
item.description:
The corner of Hawthorn Road and Methuen has become a meeting point for drug addicts to use and meet their dealers. This must be addressed now! We have young children walking past this every day and itâ€™s getting more and blatant. There is a camera situated on the lamp post which is totally ignored and obviously is t working. This needs to be addressed as a matter of urgency.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Methuen Road, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement is slippery, 3rd January
